>>Q2. For flow to be turbulent the flow should be more than 400.<< ()True ()False
>>Q3. Concept of Reynolds number is used in open channels.<< ()True False
>>Q4. The behavior of path lines is laminar flow.<< ()True ()False
>>Q5. If the Reynolds number is in between 2000 and 4000 then the flow is.<< ()True ()False
